title: LUXANNA Large Decorative Scented Spiral Twirl Candle (White) - Handmade Aesthetic Candle for Home Decor - Minimalist Soy Wax Scented Candles Ideal Gift for Mother's Day, Birthday, Wedding, etc.
features: ✅【Large Scented Spiral Twirl Candle】- Unlike most decorative candles on the market, this one-of-a-kind spiral twirl candle is large enough despite its elegant design. This aesthetic spiral twirl candle dimensions are 4.41 x 4.41 x 4.45 inches, and its weight is 1.76 lbs.

✅【100% Natural and Safe】- Our scented decorative aesthetic candles are all made of natural premium soy wax and cotton wicks that are safe for both humans and pets. Our spiral twirl candles are scented with citrus, creating a delightful ambiance in any space in your home or room.

✅【Perfect Gift Idea】- Our decorative aesthetic spiral twirl candles are handcrafted and beautifully designed. They also come in exquisite packaging, making them the perfect gift option for your loved ones and for special occasions like weddings, birthdays, Christmas, Valentine's Day, and Thanksgiving.

✅【Easy To Use & Long Lasting】- Trim the candle wick before burning to 6-8 mm. For the first time, burn this cute candle for at least two hours until the surface is evenly heated and melted. To avoid candle exposure, store it at 41-68 degrees Celsius. If extinguished and trimmed, our candles burn cleaner, slower, and longer than other soy wax scented candles (lasting 30+ hours).

✅【Satisfaction Guarantee】- Our mission at LUXANNA DECOR is to make your home look its absolute best by applying our decorative candles aesthetic to the space. We stand behind our product and guarantee your satisfaction. So don't wait any longer; click ADD TO CART and make your home light up.
